description: Google Cloud project ID. You can find your Project ID from the Google Cloud dashboard.
name: project_id

description: Google Cloud private key ID. You can find this in the JSON service account key file.
name: private_key_id

description: Private key of the service account. You can find the service account key on the Service Account section of the project dashboard.
displayname: Private key of the service account
name: private_key

description: Client email. The email of ther service account can be found in the IAM & Admin section of the project dashboard.
name: client_email

description: Client ID. You can find the Client ID in the APIs & Services section of the project dashboard.
name: client_id

description: Authorization URI for the service account. You can find this in the JSON service account key file.
name: auth_uri

description: Token URI for the service account. You can find this in the JSON service account key file.
name: token_uri

description: URL for the authorization provider certificate. You can find this in the JSON service account key file.
displayname: URL for the authorization provider certificate
name: auth_provider_x509_cert_url

description: URL for the client certificate. You can find this in the JSON service account key file.
name: client_x509_cert_url
